pages.text:
CHANGING THE GOLF GAME
It’s simple. Drive Shack is bringing a fresh alternative to the day and nightlife scenes with more than just a place to go, but an entertainment and games destination, restaurant, and event venue–where you can be yourself and enjoy yourself.

 

So, we leave our doors open, prepare our team, and welcome you to a morning, noon, or night of bad swings, good food and drinks, and great times.

We’ve covered all the bases – from the space and the staff, to the communities that keeps us going.

Building an Entertainment Ecosystem
We pride ourselves on creating an experience our guests can enjoy from the moment they enter to the time they leave.
With Some of the Best Talent Around
Our team consists of energetic, passionate people ready to take on the excitement of the day, and the thrill of the nightlife.
Join Our Crew
While Giving Back to the Communities We Call Home
We owe our success to the communities we’re located in. So, we believe it is our responsibility to give back to the communities who give so much to us.

DRIVE SHACK CAREERS
Do you have the energy and drive to encourage, celebrate, and motivate every person that comes through our doors? Then we’d love to hear from you about our job opportunities at the intersection of entertainment and sports. Check out our open roles in
each location
and at the
support center
.
Explore Roles
The Culture
We’re passionate, electric, vibrant. We literally work in a state-of-the-art entertainment space created for good times and great memories — so it’s only right that we bring the energy 24/7. At the heart of it all, we’re a team and it’s our individuality that makes us a great one. We come from all walks of life, all cultures, all beliefs, and we all share one goal: to make each day or night for our guests, one to remember.
"I love working for Drive Shack because they allow me to have the best time possible with my coworkers and guests. As well as express my personality to its fullest."
Joelle
Bartender
"It's rewarding and fun. I look forward to going to work every day."
Jordana
Guest Relations
"Drive Shack brings so much excitement to a workplace and I truly feel like I'm a part of one big family. The culture is unlike any other and I love the interactions I get to have with my guests to keep them coming back."
Brittany
Server/Event Host
"I love working for Drive Shack! This company has brought so much opportunity into my life and so many people I consider to be family."
Des
Server

I held a work event at Drive Shack. It could not have went any better! Kenzie was our point of contact and the process was a breeze. We will be holding many more events here going forward.
Landon Heath, Google Reviews
As a past platinum member of Topgolf, I’m choosing Drive Shack Richmond any day! They support the community with local events, and the culture is genuine unlike the other golf places.
Traven Carter, Google Reviews
Great family atmosphere to celebrate a birthday with kids and grandkids! Sarah Davidson made the event so special! Looking forward to the next time.
George Norrington, Google Reviews
TEE UP THE MOMENT
With the perfect venue, gameplay, food, and drink, we’ll make your event a hole-in-one!
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
What is the difference between an online reservation and an event?
Our online reservation system is available for groups of 1-6 guests to book a single-bay. The reservation allows them to be moved to the top of the waitlist and sat in the first available single-bay upon arrival at their selected reservation time.
By booking an event, we ensure that the appropriate number of bays are reserved together and fully prepared in advance for your group. This allows us to allocate the necessary staff to provide efficient speed of service, creating a smoother and more enjoyable experience for all participants. This is the only way we guarantee multiple bays side-by-side. Walk-ins are always welcome during regular business hours, however, depending on availability, your bays will not be placed together.
Does booking an event guarantee my bays side-by-side?
Absolutely! When you book an event, we make sure to reserve the appropriate number of bays together to accommodate your entire group, ensuring that everyone can enjoy the experience together.
What is the maximum number of guests per bay?
A single bay comfortably accommodates up to 6 guests, whether they’re actively golfing or not. This ensures there’s enough space for everyone to enjoy the experience (whether they’re participating in the game or simply socializing) and helps manage safety with capacity levels.
How do you accommodate guests that are attending our event but don’t plan on golfing?
Guests often say they’re not planning on golfing, but don’t count them out–many end up giving it a try and having a great time! That said, we still have to account for all guests in your final headcount, as even non-golfers are taking up space in the bays. This helps us ensure we have the right amount of space, seating, and staffing to make sure everyone has a great time–whether they’re golfing or just socializing!
What is included in Drive Shack’s event packages?
Drive Shack event packages include reserved bays, your choice of catered menu, alcoholic beverages (optional), dedicated staff, entertainment, and customizable add-ons to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience for your group
Do you allow outside food and beverage?
The only outside food and/or beverage we allow is a store purchased cake with the ingredients list on the packaging. Our venue offers a variety of food and drink options available through our bays, on-site restaurant or bar, which are part of our event packages and regular guest experience.
Should you have any additional questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to
driveshackevents@driveshack.com.
